languages.text: "Я здесь, рядом. Скажи лишь слово, и я облекусь гневом Его против врагов наших!"
"I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"
languages.original_text: "Я здесь, рядом. Скажи лишь слово, и я облекусь гневом Его против врагов наших!"

traits.locale_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"
"I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"
"I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"
"I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

languages.text: “我就在这里，在你身边。只要你开口，我就会让我们的敌人沐浴在神皇的怒火之中！”
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

traits.locale_text: “我就在这里，在你身边。只要你开口，我就会让我们的敌人沐浴在神皇的怒火之中！”

languages.text: «Estoy aquí, a su disposición. ¡Dé la orden y haré caer la furia del Emperador sobre nuestros enemigos!».
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy aquí, a su disposición. ¡Dé la orden y haré caer la furia del Emperador sobre nuestros enemigos!».

languages.text: 「私はここにいる。一言、そう言ってくれ。そうすれば私は我らの敵に、主の怒りを振るおう！」
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はここにいる。一言、そう言ってくれ。そうすれば私は我らの敵に、主の怒りを振るおう！」

languages.text: « Je suis là, à votre service. Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire et je déchaînerai Sa fureur contre nos ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis là, à votre service. Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire et je déchaînerai Sa fureur contre nos ennemis ! »

languages.text: "Ich bin hier, zugegen. Ein Wort von Euch reicht und ich führe seinen Zorn gegen unsere Feinde ins Feld!"
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hier, zugegen. Ein Wort von Euch reicht und ich führe seinen Zorn gegen unsere Feinde ins Feld!"

languages.text: "Buradayım. Hazırım. Söylemen yeterli, O'nun gazabını düşmanlarımızın üzerine hiç beklemeden salarım!"
languages.original_text: "I am here, at hand. Say the word, and I will wield His wrath against our enemies!"
